alert.note: Alert for Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 2:58AM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 16 inches. Locally higher amounts nearing 2 feet of snow possible. * WHERE...Southwest San Juan Mountains. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect lulls in snowfall through the warning period.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
